title: Welcome to My Blog
content: This is the first article on my blog. Stay tuned for more updates!

title: Understanding React and Express
content: React is a powerful library for building user interfaces, while Express is a minimalist backend framework. Together, they form a great stack for full-stack development.

title: Top 5 JavaScript Tips for Beginners
content: JavaScript is versatile, but learning it can be tricky. Here are my top 5 tips to help you become proficient in JavaScript: 1. Understand closures, 2. Master async/await, 3. Use ES6 features, 4. Debug effectively, 5. Practice coding challenges.
